synopsis.native: Due coppie che stavano per lasciarsi ora sono costrette a vivere forzatamente sotto lo stesso tetto tutto per causa dell'isolamento obbligatorio.
synopsis.english: The film follows the story of two couples in crisis who are about to break up but who, due to the Lockdown, imposed to stop the spread of the coronavirus, will instead be forced into a forced coexistence. The protagonists, through smartkworking, household chores and sports activities, will find themselves living under the same roof, giving life to a comedy full of laughter but also of reflections.
